title: OPS Support Agent Hourly
description:
Air Network; Road Network; Hub Operations; Storage, Fashion & Solutions; Ground Operations: Air Network Support; Air Network Control; Ramp/Air Operations; Ramp & Gateway Operations; Air Feeder Linehaul; Road Networks; Operational Support; Customer Service; Operational Administration & Support; Sort Support & Trace Management; Reporting; Location-based Customer Service
   

  

 Responsible for the completion of defined processes and procedures to deadline, ensuring accuracy, completeness, and compliance with relevant internal and external standards. Identifies anomalies as they arise and uses judgement based on rules and procedures to resolve. For complex issues, may escalate to senior team members.
   

  

 Accuracy & Attention to Detail; Microsoft Office & PC Skills; Planning & Organizing Skills; Interpersonal Skills; Problem Solving Skills
   

  

 FedEx was built on a philosophy that puts people first, one we take seriously. We are an equal opportunity employer and we are committed to a diverse and inclusive workforce in which we provide growth opportunities for all
   

  

 Our Company
   

  

 FedEx is one of the world's largest express transportation companies and has consistently been selected as one of the top 10 World’s Most Admired Companies by "Fortune" magazine. Every day FedEx delivers for its customers with transportation and business solutions, serving more than 220 countries and territories around the globe. We can serve this global network due to our outstanding team of FedEx team members, who are tasked with making every FedEx experience outstanding.
   

  

 Our Philosophy
   

  

 The People-Service-Profit philosophy (P-S-P) describes the principles that govern every FedEx decision, policy or activity. FedEx takes care of our people; they, in turn, deliver the impeccable service demanded by our customers, who reward us with the profitability necessary to secure our future. The essential element in making the People-Service-Profit philosophy such a positive force for the company is where we close the circle, and return these profits back into the business, and invest back in our people. Our success in the industry is attributed to our people. Through our P-S-P philosophy, we have a work environment that encourages team members to be innovative in delivering the highest possible quality of service to our customers. We care for their well-being, and value their contributions to the company.
   

  

 Our Culture
   

  

 Our culture is important for many reasons, and we intentionally bring it to life through our behaviors, actions and activities in every part of the world. The FedEx culture and values have been a cornerstone of our success and growth since we began in the early 1970’s. While other companies can copy our systems, infrastructure and processes, our culture makes us unique and is often a differentiating factor as we compete and grow in today’s global marketplace.

title: Senior fullstack developer, Solna
description:
Are you a passionate developer who wants to make a difference in people's everyday lives? PostNord is now looking for a key player to one of our teams within Customer Solutions where we develop innovative consumer services for a smoother delivery experience. Our services are used by millions of customers daily via PostNord’s web and app.
   

  

**Join us**
 With us, you are met by an open and warm work environment, here we are constantly working to learn and improve. We work agile in a DevOps culture. The teams are the backbone of our organization and are self-governing, which means great opportunities to influence technology choices and working methods.
   

  

**You Will, Among Other Things, Work With**
* Improve the customer experience at checkout and contribute to making PostNord the preferred shipping option.
* Develop and improve live tracking and Estimated Time of Delivery (ETA) services for home, parcel locker and service point deliveries, so our customers can plan their day with precision.
* Develop our internal backend system used for calculating PostNords routes including development and maintenance of internal websites.
* Contribute to the development of a consolidating API that orchestrates PostNord's various services for efficient communication to our sending customers


**Your profile**
 To be successful in this role we believe that you are curious, driven and have a strong eager for constant learning and development of new skills.
   

  

**But Also**
* You have extensive experience in development with some typed language, preferably Java, all the way from the REST interface to the database.
* You have extensive experience in front-end development with TypeScript, Vue 3 and CSS.
* You are also familiar with testing, preferably with Cypress.
* You have experience in new development of services where you have been part of design, architecture, requirements, development, testing, commissioning in production and maintenance after launch. Have you done it with Spring Boot, Docker & Kubernetes, and AWS is a big plus.
* You have worked with agile working methods and according to DevOps principles.
* You have experience and understanding of CI/CD and management of Infrastructure as Code (IaC).
* You want to have full control over how the code you have written works in production and is visualized with monitoring tools such as Prometheus and Grafana.
* Academic education in computer science or equivalent experience.
* At least 5 years relevant working experience.
* Fluent english in speech and writing.


 It is also a big plus if you have experience in e-commerce and logistics.
   

  

**We offer you**
* To work with our modern tech stack and you are given great opportunities to influence the choice of technology.
* Hybrid workplace with a Nordic and dynamic environment. Watch the video about our office
* We encourage you to develop. For example, we sponsor you for AWS certification.
* Good insurance and occupational pension conditions.
* Wellness allowance and access to office gym and swimming pool.
* Employee benefits through PostNord Plus - PostNord's own personnel foundation.
* Employment according to a collective agreement.


**We make everyday life easier**
 PostNord is the leading supplier of communication and logistics solutions to, from, and within the Nordic region. We ensure the provision of a postal service to households and businesses in Sweden and Denmark. We aim to make everyday life easier and more sustainable for everyone who lives and works in the Nordic region. We are accountable, brave and committed, effectively leading change regardless if we lead our self or others. We emphasize teamwork, sincerity and positive relationships in the workplace. We build on our success and learn from both colleagues and mistakes. People with different backgrounds work with us. You will therefore be part of a workplace with great diversity, which contributes to better results for the business. Visit us at postnord.com.
   

  

**Apply**
 What are you waiting for? Welcome with your application! If you have any questions about the position, you are welcome to contact recruiting manager robert.svensson-eshraghi@postnord.com . Note that we do not accept applications via email. We look forward to hearing from you!
   

  

**We will start the selection process in mid August!**
 For union representatives, visit: www.postnord.com/fackliga

title: Sales Manager
description:
We are looking for a
 **Sales Manager** 
 to join our
 **Sales & Strategic Partnerships team** 
 in the Corporate Customers and Markets (CCM) business unit that is responsible for being the customer interface for large industrial customers, electricity retailers and other power trading companies in the Nordic market.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As an experienced Sales Manager you will develop our high-value sales negotiations and contribute to the overall strategic direction of the sales team. Your office location will be Solna, Sweden but you will also spend time traveling to meet customers.
   

  

  

  

 Your key responsibilities will include:
   

  

  

* Actively seeking new clients, identifying potential business opportunities for growth and building a client base.
* Sales Presentations and Demonstrations: delivering product or service presentations, demonstrations, and pitches to potential clients.
* Leading negotiations, handling objections and ultimately closing sales deals.
* Managing and nurturing relationships with key or high-value clients, ensuring their needs and customer satisfaction are met and identifying opportunities for growth.
* Keeping records of sales activities in CRM, maintaining customer databases.


 The scope of this role covers Fortum full product range incl Commodity Market Access, PPAs, physical supply, portfolio management, Guarantees of origin, flexibility services and strategic partnerships as for example of hydrogen, new nuclear and renewable projects. You will network within the industry as well as managing CCM’s existing customer relationships also means cooperation with other business areas of Fortum Group.
   

  

**About You**
 You are a highly driven and pro-active individual and are ready to go beyond the expected requirements of the role. You are also well-structured with the ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and in a fast paced sales culture.
   

  

 Furthermore, you will have:
   

  

  

* Several years of experience from sales
* Experience gained from the energy industry
* Proven track record of meeting or exceeding targets
* An understanding of the complexities of large industrial customers
* Sales and negotiation skills with the ability to understand the needs and challenges in handling complex contracts and large industrial customers
* Experience in large-scale energy contracts is seen as an added advantage
* Experience dealing with multiple stakeholders, both internal and external
* Strong interpersonal and influencing skills
* University degree and/or a MBA or other applicable degree is preferred
* Excellent oral and written communication skills in English and Swedish


 A strong commercial awareness and the ability to build relationships is a must for this role. The ideal candidate will also be exceptionally committed to strive for customer excellence and will be result- and business oriented.
   

  

  

  

**We offer you**
 The position provides great development opportunities and the chance to be involved in and influence the company’s strategic priorities in close collaboration with other key personal in the Nordics.
   

  

 At Fortum, we believe in a better future and want to be involved in shaping it. Our workplace is a safe place, both physically and mentally. You will grow with professional colleagues, being trusted and free to challenge yourself. We offer comprehensive benefits, flexible working hours, and hybrid work model to support your productivity, development and wellbeing. We are committed to build diverse teams where everyone feels included and is treated equally.
   

  

 More information about our culture and benefits can be found here.
   

  

**Interested?**
 Submit your application in English via our recruitment tool as soon as possible, but no later than the 11th of August 2024. If you would like to hear more about the position, please contact Patrik Hamberg at +46703445019, patrik.hamberg@fortum.com
   

  

**Our recruitment process**
 Please note that the recruitment is on hold during the summer month of July. We will begin screening early August and might begin interviews before the end of the application period.
   

  

 After thorough screening, we will invite the chosen candidates to interview with us in August. The recruitment process will includes two interviews and a digital assessment for those chosen for the second interview. The last steps of the process will include a final discussion and reference checks.
   

  

 To be selected for the position, the applicant may need to go through background clearance and a health examination.
   

  

**We are Fortum**
 Fortum is a Nordic energy company. Our purpose is to power a world where people, businesses and nature thrive together. We are one of the cleanest energy producers in Europe and our actions are guided by our ambitious environmental targets. We generate and deliver clean energy reliably and help industries to decarbonise their processes and grow. Our core operations in the Nordics comprise of efficient, CO2-free power generation as well as reliable supply of electricity and district heat to private and business customers. For our :5 000 employees, we commit to be a safe, and inspiring workplace. Fortum's share is listed on Nasdaq Helsinki. fortum.com

title: Dataskyddsjurist till Deloitte Legal i Stockholm!
description:
*Deloitte erbjuder tjänster inom revision, management consulting, finansiell rådgivning, riskhantering, skatterådgivning, affärsjuridik och relaterade områden. Med mer än 465 000 medarbetare i över 150 länder hjälper vi våra klienter och vår omvärld att lösa komplexa problem och nå högt uppsatta mål. Det som definierar Deloitte är vår strävan att göra en meningsfull skillnad. Vi tror att när våra klienter och vårt samhälle blir starkare, blir vi det också.* 




 Är du en affärsintresserad, driven jurist med inriktning inom dataskydd, IT-rätt, AI och/eller IP-rätt? Gillar du dessutom konsultrollen, är intresserad av verksamhetsutveckling och trivs i en internationell miljö där du erbjuds stora utvecklingsmöjligheter? Då kanske du vill bli vår nästa kollega?
   

  




**Jobbeskrivning**

 På Deloitte Legal arbetar vi för att erbjuda våra kunder äkta helhetslösningar där kvalitativ rådgivning, branschkunskap och kommersiellt tänkande kombineras med tekniska lösningar. Hos oss på Deloitte Legal blir du del i ett proaktivt och växande team bestående av jurister med spetskunskap inom dataskydd. Du kommer att arbeta i team tillsammans med våra övriga kollegor inom Legal med projekt inom framförallt M&A, bolagsrätt, avtalsrätt och arbetsrätt men även medDeloittes övriga affärsområden ofta med frågor kopplade till informationssäkerhet och management consulting. Dina kunder kommer att bestå av alltifrån noterade internationella bolag till svenska mellanstora bolag inom olika branscher.Vi erbjuder en kreativ miljö där du ges stor frihet att påverka vår tillväxtresa framåt.
 



 Dina arbetsuppgifter kommer till största del bestå av varierande juridiska frågor inom dataskyddsområdet såsom:
 


* Samordna, driva och delta i dataskyddsprojekt inkl. implementeringsprojekt och riskanalyser.
* Upprättande och granskning av dataskyddsrelaterade avtal såsom PuB-avtal.
* Frågor och rättsutredningar hänförliga till bl.a. dataskydd, AI och molntjänster.
* Fungera som dataskyddsombud för vissa av Deloittes kunder.
* Internrevision, granskning av regelefterlevnad.
* Dataskyddsarbete i samband med företagstransaktioner.
* Hålla utbildningar inom dataskydd.


**Kvalifikationer**
* Juristexamen med minst 5 års erfarenhet av dataskyddsfrågor. Tidigare arbete från konsultverksamhet är extra meriterande liksom erfarenhet inom AI, IT-rätt och IP-rätt.
* Erfarenhet att driva projekt, granska och förhandla personuppgiftsrelaterade avtal.
* Då många uppdrag sker på engelska pratar och skriver du engelska obehindrat.



 ​​​​Då Deloitte Legal befinner sig i en stark tillväxtfas är det väldigt viktigt att du har intresse av affärsutveckling och marknadsföring, har lätt för att bygga nätverk och knyta egna kontakter. Du bör även drivas av att utveckla och coacha juniora kollegor.
 



 Det är viktigt för oss att du, förutom att vara ambitiös och lösningsorienterad, även har social kompetens samt ett stort intresse för dataskyddsfrågor. Du trivs i en internationell miljö, är prestigelös, och uppskattar att arbeta i team.
   

  

  




**Ytterligare information**

 Vi erbjuder en chans att vara med på en tillväxtresa som ger rätt person stora möjligheter att växa och utvecklas inte bara som jurist utan även som ledare och konsult. Som anställd på Deloitte blir du del av världens största internationella konsultbyrå med kontor i 150 olika länder. Du erbjuds att arbeta i och kompetensutvecklas i en internationell miljö tillsammans med Deloitte Legals ca 2500 jurister över hela världen. Möjligheter till arbete vid Deloittes andra kontor runt om i världen finns.
   

  

 Genom samarbete med Deloittes övriga affärsområden har Deloitte Legal möjlighet att erbjuda våra kunder äkta helhetslösningar där juridiken kompletteras av exempelvis informationssäkerhet, IT-revision och projektledning med stöd av nya tekniska lösningar. Deloitte satsar stort på kompetensutveckling, bland annat i form av individuella utvecklingsplaner, en privat coach, individuell feedback, utbildningar inom såväl juridik som branschkunskap och ledarskapsträning.
   

  

 Vi värdesätter att du balanserar arbete med fritid och du erbjuds en flexibel arbetsplats med möjlighet att arbeta hemifrån delar av veckan.
   





**Ansökan** 
  

 Du ansöker online. Din ansökanska bestå av:
 


* CV
* Personligt brev
* Betygskopior från högskola/universitet



 Notera att du behöver ladda upp samtliga dokument för att din ansökan ska ses som fullständig.
 **Skicka in din ansökan så snart som möjligt då vi arbetar med löpande urval vilket innebär att tjänsten kan tillsättas tidigare, sista ansökningsdag är 15 augusti 2024.** 




 Vid eventuella frågor kring ansökningsförfarandet är du välkommen att kontakta Jennifer Capdevila, Talent Acquisition Specialist, via mejl jcapdevila@deloitte.se. Har du frågor kring tjänsten kontaktar du Maria Lilliestierna, Partner på Legal, via mlilliestierna@deloitte.se.
 



  

*Som ett kvalitativt led i Deloittes rekryteringsprocess genomgår våra slutkandidater en bakgrundskontroll, detta för att öka kännedomen om våra framtida medarbetare, trygga arbetsmiljön för våra medarbetare och möta regelkrav. Processen för bakgrundskontroller genomförs i samarbete med ToFindOut.* 
*https://tofindout.se/sv/faq/* 




**What impact will you make?** 




 På Deloitte gör ditt arbete en meningsfull skillnad, varje dag, medan du växer i en inkluderande företagskultur av samarbete och hög prestation. Utöver att skapa lösningar strävar vi efter att göra en positiv och avgörande skillnadför andra i vår omgivning, våra klienter och samhället. På Deloitte hittar du tidigare dolda möjligheter att lyckas och inser din fulla potential.

title: Account Manager till Elovade
description:
Elovade är ett bolag som strävar efter att tillhandahålla de absolut bästa lösningarna inom IT i syfte att underlätta arbetet och öka lönsamheten hos sina partners. De önskar nu utöka teamet och söker efter en driven och hungrig Account Manager som vill växa in i rollen långsiktigt. Låter detta som någonting för dig? Sök då tjänsten redan idag då vi tillämpar ett löpande urval!
 



  

**Företag :**
 Elovade
 



  

**Plats :**
 Årsta
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 Försäljning
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 Omgående
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Rekrytering
   




**Om tjänsten**

 Tjänsten som Account Manager på Elovade passar dig som vill ta steget in på ett spännande och växande It-företag. Elovade är en ledande mjukvarudistributör inom IT i Skandinavien, och med mångårig kompetens tillhandahåller dem marknadens smartaste och mest innovativa lösningar exklusivt till IT-Konsulter och interna IT-avdelningar. På Elovade får du möjlighet att jobba på ett bolag som är specialiserade inom IT-baserade affärs- och verksamhetslösningar med fokus på drift, övervakning och automatisering. Som Account Manager hos Elovade får du möjligheten att utveckla din kompetens inom området samt bli en del av ett företag där tekniken ligger i framkant. Du erbjuds även ett flexibelt arbete med möjlighet till distansarbete samt frihet under ansvar. Tjänsten är en direktrekrytering vilket innebär att rekryteringsprocessen sker genom Academic Work men du kommer att anställas direkt hos Elovade.
 


  


 I rollen kommer du främst att arbeta med försäljning på ett relationskapande sätt, med främst nya kunder. På sikt förväntas du ha god förståelse för Elovades tjänster, och då är det viktigt att du informerar och säljer in nya idéer till dina kunder samt att du agerar rådgivande vid diverse frågor. Ett axplock av dina ansvarsområden:
 


  

  
* Prospektering genom att söka upp och kontakta nya företag genom kalla samtal
  
* Identifiera kundbehov och affärsmöjligheter
  
* Genom virtuella webbmöten med dina kunder utför du gedigna behovsanalyser, bygger relationer och är en god ambassadör för Elovades varumärke
  
* Jobba mot personligt uppsatta säljmål
  

  


**Vi söker dig som**

 I den här rekryteringen kommer vi att lägga stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper, men för att kvalificera för tjänsten så tror vi att du har ca
   

**ett års erfarenhet av B2B försäljning**
 där det ingått arbetsuppgifter som prospektering, nykundsbearbetning och kalla samtal. Det är mycket meriterande om du har arbetat med försäljning inom IT. Det är även ett krav att du är flytande i svenska och engelska i tal och skrift, då arbetet utförs i dessa språk.
 


  

  

**Egenskaper som vi söker hos dig:**
  

  
* Orädd
  
* Resultatinriktad
  
* Strukturerad
  
* Relationsskapande
  


  

  

  

  

  

  

**Övrig information**
  

  
* Start: Omgående
  
* Omfattning: Heltid
  
* Placering: Stockholm, Årsta
  


  


 Rekryteringsprocessen hanteras av Academic Work och kundens önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten hanteras av Academic Work. Vi går igenom urvalet löpande och annonsen kan stängas ner innan tjänsten är tillsatt om vi gått över till urvals- och intervjufasen.
 


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
  


 Denna rekryteringsprocess hanteras av Academic Work och vår kunds önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten skickas till Academic Work.
   

 Vi tillämpar löpande urval och annonsen kan därmed komma att tas ned innan sista ansökningsdag om det är så att vi har gått vidare till urvals- och intervjufas. Rekryteringsprocessen innehåller två urvalstest: ett personlighetstest och ett test i kognitiv förmåga. Testerna är ett verktyg för att kunna hitta den kandidat med högst potential för tjänsten samt främja jämlikhet, mångfald och en rättvis rekryteringsprocess.
   




**Elovade**

 Läs mer om Elovade här
   




**Bli direktrekryterad till Elovade**

 Detta är en direktrekrytering, vilket betyder att den kandidat som får tjänsten blir direktanställd av kundföretaget. Rekryteringsprocessen hanteras av Academic Work.
   




**Har du frågor om tjänsten?**

 Petar Cakovski eller någon av kollegorna i rekryteringsteamet svarar dig gärna på recruitmentstockholmsouth@academicwork.se Ange annons-ID i ditt mail: 15100603

title: Senior Legal Counsel (SE)
description:
Are you ready to take your legal career to the next and help us build the most innovative and compliant solutions in the banking industry? 🌟
 



  





 At Lunar we are democratizing the power of money and changing the way we all bank, pay, and invest. We have grown by leaps and bounds since starting in Aarhus in 2015 and are now considered a major player in the Nordics with offices in Copenhagen, and Stockholm, as well as employees working remotely across Europe.
 



  





 As our new Senior Legal Counsel, you will be part of our Legal Affairs team, reporting to Mikkel Skovgård Prehn. The team currently comprises 8 amazing individuals, working across Copenhagen, Aarhus, and Stockholm, who are focused on providing top-tier legal support.
 



 You’ll work closely with different teams, using your legal expertise to navigate challenges and support our mission.
 



  





 We encourage all candidates to apply for this exciting role and look forward to following up with candidates who we believe are the best potential fit based on the following criteria:
 


* Swedish Master’s Degree in Legal
* Experienced professional who can work independently
* Passionate about supporting and helping other departments with legal insights and solutions
* Strong ability to translate legal knowledge to your non-legal colleagues.
* Solution-oriented mindset with the ability to not only point out discrepancies but also provide solutions and guidance
* Relationship building skills and experience, as Legal work very closely with the entire organization
* Experienced working in an agile environment, capable of dynamic prioritization
* Fluency in Swedish



  





**What will you do?** 



* Provide legal support across Lunar
* Manage corporate governance for our Swedish entities
* Support product development initiatives
* Build and maintain strong cross-departmental relationships in a dynamic workplace
* Able to take ownership of your area of expertise



  





 You’ll have the opportunity to work independently, take ownership of your projects, and be a part of a forward-thinking team that’s at the forefront of banking innovation.
 



  





 If this opportunity excites you, we’d love to hear from you. Apply now and let us get to know you better!
 



  





 Want to know more about what we’re up to? Follow us on LinkedIn 📢 for business announcements and releases, check out our Instagram 📸 for an inside scoop on what it’s like to work here, and visit our blog 💻 for the latest tech and product insights!

description:

title: Pricing Student Assistant or Intern
company: Oil and Gas Job Search Ltd
description:
Are you ready to take this step in your early career towards developing yourself and use all your newly earned competencies in an interactive and exciting setting in a global company with a truly sustainable focus?
   

  

 Do you find it exciting to interact with international colleagues and support different tasks within pricing?
   

  

 Then this position may be a perfect fit for you. We are looking for either an intern or a student assistant to support us with our Swedish pricing initiatives.
   

  

**Make a difference at Schneider Electric**
 Schneider Electric is a global frontrunner in green energy solutions and operates within the market areas of industry, energy and infrastructure, data centers, industrial construction as well as housing with a broad supply of solutions and products for energy optimization and electrification.
   

  

 We are a global company with a strong local presence. We are more than 135,000 employees in 100 countries creating an annual turnover of EUR 25 billion.
   

  

**The tasks**
* Monitor pricing performance
* Report metrics to the rest of the organization
* Perform ad-hoc analysis to support business decisions
* Support with analytics (dashboards and models)
* Data transfers and clean-ups
* Price administration and control
* Animate the community of local key stakeholders


 You are detail-oriented and good at collaborating with different internal stakeholders. You are not afraid to challenge status quo and you thrive in communicating both written and verbally with colleagues from all over the world. Previous experience with Excel and/or Tableau is a plus.
   

  

 You will be a great fit if you feel comfortable in a dynamic work environment and have both an administrative and an analytical mindset.
   

  

 You will work closely together with our Pricing Manager and with colleagues from different business units within Schneider Electric.
   

  

 If you search for a student job, the working hours will be around 15 hours per week with a good hourly wage. Of course, you will get access to the same facilities as all your colleagues such as activities, canteen, fitness etc.
   

  

 If you are looking for an internship, we are flexible about the working hours, preferably for 6 months depending on your studies.
   

  

**We Believe You Are The Right One If You**
* Are studying a bachelor's or a master's degree within economics, finance, business intelligence or some other relevant field
* Are curios and eager to learn
* Are interested in working with many different colleagues from different countries and business areas such as finance, marketing, and sales


 Your workplace will be at Solna (Frösundavik), Frösundaviks allé 1, 16970, Solna (Frösundavik), with the flexibility to work remotely.
   

  

**Be part of a collaborative and creative environment**
 You get to take part in a creative environment, where you collaborate with experienced and professional colleagues, as you cooperate on solving exciting tasks with substantial influence. Sparring and knowledge sharing are essential parts of your day, just like you get to be part of our many social activities.
   

  

 At Schneider Electric, you will meet highly competent and skilled colleagues from all around the world contributing to our commitment to redefine energy management, keep data secure and address the energy dilemma for a more sustainable planet.
   

  

 We hire people in all ages and with very different backgrounds, educations, and competencies. This ensures a diverse and inclusive environment. We have a good atmosphere between our Young Professionals, and you get a job with a high degree of independence, responsibility, and important tasks. Read more on our career page.
   

  

**Interested?**
 If you have any questions regarding the position, please contact Filip Lundin at filip.lundin@se.com.
   

  

 Please note, that we cannot provide relocation for international students at this time, so you must be enrolled at a university in Sweden.
   

  

 Please apply online as soon as possible by sending your CV and student credentials.
   

  

**Why us?**
 Schneider Electric is leading the digital transformation of energy management and automation. Our technologies enable the world to use energy in a safe, efficient and sustainable manner. We strive to promote a global economy that is both ecologically viable and highly productive.
   

  

 ₠25.7bn global revenue
   

  

 137 000+ employees in 100+ countries
   

  

 45% of revenue from IoT
   

  

 5% of revenue devoted for R&D
   

  

 You must submit an online application to be considered for any position with us. This position will be posted until filled
   

  

 It is the policy of Schneider Electric to provide equal employment and advancement opportunities in the areas of recruiting, hiring, training, transferring, and promoting all qualified individuals regardless of race, religion, color, gender, disability, national origin, ancestry, age, military status, sexual orientation, marital status, or any other legally protected characteristic or conduct. Concerning agencies: Schneider Electric does not accept unsolicited resumes and will not be responsible for fees related to such.

title: Management Trainee
description:
We are hiring a superstar Management Trainee to support the General Partners at Norrsken VC!
 



  





 Norrsken VC is Europe’s largest early-stage impact VC fund focused on investing in rapidly scaling early-stage start-ups that use technology to solve some of the world’s greatest challenges while building highly profitable businesses. Norrsken VC was incubated by Norrsken Foundation but today operates as an independent venture capital fund. Norrsken Foundation is a non-profit organisation supporting entrepreneurs daring to tackle society's biggest challenges, such as poverty, mental health, famine, food waste and environmental issues.
 



  





 We are a small team of 15 with an entrepreneurial spirit, where every person makes a significant contribution to our results. We are now looking for the next person to help us achieve our mission: to make a dent in the world by proving that impact investing can combine a positive impact on people and the planet with strong financial returns.
 



  





**The traineeship is paid and full-time for a minimum of six, up to twelve months, starting in the fall of 2024.** 




  





 Our dream candidate has a passion for impact, analytical skills and problem-solving ability. You enjoy working in a fast-paced environment where every day is different from the previous one. Maybe you've already built up some working experience - be it from the investment world, consulting, start-ups, industry, or the nonprofit sector - or maybe you haven't had the opportunity yet, but have a strong passion and drive! For this traineeship opportunity, it is less about what you've done so far, and more about who you are, what motivates you, and if you share our passion for impact and entrepreneurship.
 



  





 The role is
 **Stockholm-based,** 
 but our team is international, and we strongly believe that we make the best decisions as a diverse team. Hence, all applicants are encouraged, and we are excited to see what new perspectives our next hire will bring to the team! The only limitation is that we unfortunately cannot sponsor work visas in Sweden for this role.
 



  





**Examples of areas you will take part of:** 



* Be heavily involved in all areas of the organisation; marketing/comms, events, finance, impact and investments.
* Support in both operational and strategic processes.
* Work hands-on with projects related to events, fundraising, team development, etc.
* Support in other AdHoc tasks



  





 You report to one of our General Partners and work closely with all members of the management team on a rotating schedule. Note that while you will be working very closely with our General Partners who are all investors, however, this role is less focused on investments and more on building the Norrsken VC business and organisation. If you are looking for an opportunity to learn more about investments, please instead consider our 
 **visiting analyst role** 
 .
 



  





 We think you’ll make the most impact if you are in this role for ca 12 months, during that time, there will be plenty of opportunities to get to know impact companies in our ecosystem with the ambition to find a new challenge for you post the traineeship.
 



  





**You are a good fit if you:** 



* Want to make the world a better place, and believe that entrepreneurship and business models are great driving forces for this
* Enjoy working in a fast-paced environment, taking ownership of tasks from start to finish
* Are a positive individual who likes to contribute to a vibrant, driven and fun team culture
* Are curious to learn and enjoy deep-diving into new areas
* Are an individual who thrives in a dynamic environment, where processes may iterate along the way and no one day is like another
* Have an analytical mindset and enjoy working with numbers and data



  





 Norrsken VC is an equal-opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees and candidates. Our recruitment process is therefore designed to be as inclusive as possible.
 



  





**Recruitment process and timing** 




 Once we have received your application, you will automatically receive an email with a link to an online assessment which is to be completed within 72 hours after submitting the application. The assessment consists of 3 tests to be completed online using a computer, and shouldn’t take you more than 30 minutes to complete in total. The tests cover the competencies of Communication, Problem-solving and Numerical Reasoning.
 



  





 Following successful tests, the subsequent interview stage consists of five interviews.
 



  





**Applications close on August 11th.**

title: Czech-speaking student translator to East Capital!
description:
**Are you a student with excellent language skills in both English and Czech?**
 We are looking for a flexible and motivated individual to assist East Capital with translation tasks during events and occasionally travel with them to event locations. This is a fantastic opportunity for you to gain valuable experience in translation and event management! Apply today as we work with ongoing selection.
 


 Apply here!
 
  

**Company :**
 East Capital International AB
 



  

**City :**
 Stockholm
 



  

**Job Category :**
 HR / Office / Admin
 



  

**Extent :**
 Part time, varying schedule on as-needed basis
 



  

**Start date :**
 August/September
 



  

**Type of work :**
 Staffing
   




**About the role**

 We are seeking a student who can work on an as-needed basis to support with translation during events and road shows. The role involves providing translation and interpretation during various events and occasionally traveling with East Capital to different event locations.
 


  


  

**You are offered**



  


 At East Capital Group they strongly believe in inclusion, fairness, and diversity. You will work in a true international environment, where you will have colleagues representing 20 different nationalities. They offer a very a dynamic work environment with engaged and skilled colleagues. You will be sitting in modern offices, located in the city- and business centre of Stockholm.
 


  


 East Capital want to make sure that all entry level and less experienced colleagues joining them are provided hands on coaching and career development within the East Capital Group, where your personal aspirations and goals coincide with the further development of your team, your department, and the East Capital Group in general, as far as possible. With the right mindset and focus on your end, you will early on be given broad and exciting responsibilities and projects, where you can count on coaching and mentorship inside and outside your immediate team.
   




**Work tasks**

 Your responsibilities will include translating presentations, assisting with communication, and providing general support to ensure our events run smoothly.
 


  

  
* Translating and interpreting information from English to Czech and vice versa during events
  
* Assisting with the translation of materials before and during events
  
* Facilitating communication between English and Czech speakers
  
* Providing support during events and travel, including logistics and planning
  
* Working closely with the team to ensure accurate translation and understanding of information
  

  


**We are looking for**

  

**Eligibility and profile:**
  

 We are looking for someone who
 


  

  
* Is a university student with at least one year left of your studies and available to work on an as-needed basis, including travel
  
* Is fluent in both English and Czech, both spoken and written
  
* Has an interest in languages and translation and enjoys working with people
  
* Is flexible and can adapt to changing tasks and environments
  
* Possesses strong organisational skills and can work under pressure
  
* Is independent and responsible
  
* Willingness to travel and be away from home for short periods.
  


  


  

**It is meritorious if you have**



  

  
* Previous experience in translation or interpretation.
  
* Experience in event planning or event support.
  


  


  

**To succeed in the role, your personal skills are:**



  

  
* Supportive
  
* Responsible
  
* Respectful
  


  

  

**Our recruitment process**
  


 This recruitment process is handled by Academic Work and it is our client’s wish that all questions regarding the position is directed to Academic Work.
 


  


 Our selection process is continuous and the advert may close before the recruitment process is completed if we have moved forward to the next phase. The process includes two tests: one personality test and one cognitive test. The tests are tools to find the right talent for the right position, to enable equality, diversity, and a fair process.
   




**East Capital International AB**

 East Capital Group is an independent asset management group that comprises several strategies and specialisations to offer active management solutions in equities, bonds, and real estate assets. Their managers work within a clear ESG framework, while also drawing on the group’s scale and overall strengths.
 


  


 Founded in Sweden in 1997 and with offices in Stockholm, Hong Kong, Luxemburg, Tallinn, Vilnius and Riga, East Capital Group manages a total of EUR 2,7 billion for a broad range of international investors including leading institutions, companies, and private individuals.
 


  


 East Capital Group also has a significant holding in the listed company Eastnine (OM:EAST), which owns, develops and manages sustainable, premium office space in the Baltic region with a net asset value of approximately EUR 573 million.
 


  


 Their investment strategy is based on extensive company knowledge gained through proprietary fundamental analysis and frequent company meetings.
 


  


 From day one, they have set out to be a long-term, active, and responsible investor and have consistently worked on developing how we address sustainability and ESG to ensure that they are able to offer sustainable investment products to thei clients. At the heart of everything they do is their impact on the countries and companies they invest in, and their aim to contribute to the advancement of sustainability in emerging and frontier markets. Read more at: www.eastcapital.com/esg
   




**Become a part of Academic Work**

 When you apply to this job, you are becoming one of many consultants at Academic Work. This means that not only will you gain fantastic benefits, but also a team of consultant managers to support you through your career with us.
 


 Read more about Academic Work

title: Dustin söker juristpraktikant till juristavdelningen för HT 2024
description:
Vi söker dig som är i slutet av dina juridikstudier och vill prova på att jobba som bolagsjurist på Dustin inom ett brett fält av affärsjuridiska områden.
   

  

 Dustin är en ledande onlinebaserad IT-partner i Norden och Benelux. Vår juristavdelning består för närvarande av cirka 20 kollegor som jobbar inom olika specialistområden, såsom Corporate Affairs, Contracts & Commercial, Legal AI & Operations, och Data Protection. Som juristpraktikant kommer du att få möjlighet att arbeta med samtliga områden.
   

  

 Vi hoppas kunna ge dig värdefulla praktikveckor hos oss på kontoret i Nacka Strand. Vi är ett härligt gäng med stark gemenskap och som brinner för att leverera högkvalitativ support till Dustins verksamhet. För att passa i rollen som praktikant hos oss, förutsätter vi att du har ett starkt intresse för affärsjuridik och legal tech. Du har en god förmåga att uttrycka dig i tal och skrift, såväl på svenska som på engelska. Som person är du driven, strukturerad och ansvarstagande. Du är också kommunikativ, positiv och målfokuserad.
   

  

 Vi erbjuder en praktikperiod som omfattar heltidsarbete under 10 veckor, med start i september. Om du önskar påbörja din praktik vid ett annat tillfälle, går det bra att ange det i din ansökan. Praktiken är oavlönad och finansieras med studiemedel.
   

  

 Om du har frågor kring tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta Sara Hedblom, Senior Legal Counsel, via e-post sara.hedblom@dustin.com eller på telefonnummer 070-9957635. Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

 Då det är sommar nu och det är semestertider kommer vi gå igenom ansökningar igen i början på augusti. Trevlig sommar! ☀

title: Two Azure Cloud Engineers
description:
**Start****31-08-2024****Duration****7-9 months**
  
Emagine are now looking for two Azure Cloud Engineers to one of our amazing banking clients.
  

  

**Start:** 2024-09-01  

**End:** 2025-03-31  

**Location:** Stockholm (3 days one site, 2 days remote)

 **Project and role description**  

As a Cloud Engineer within our Cloud Tribe, you will join a team of 20 highly engaged peers using new technologies to develop solutions and valuable services. Our delivery includes guardrails, best practices, and supporting functionalities, all of which are paving the way for clients developers to create a modern bank in the Cloud.  

  

**As a Cloud Engineer, you will:**  

* Develop and maintain services on top of Public Cloud Platforms catering for the platform’s technical Governance & Compliance.
* Work with operations, development, maintenance, and security of the platform.
 **Who we are looking for:**  

As a person, you are eager to always learn more and enjoy sharing and increasing your knowledge while working with others. You are highly engaged and interested in everything that happens in the CNCF space. You are motivated by responsibility and unafraid of tackling complex problems and finding the best possible solutions.  

  

**You have experience in both development and operations as well as familiarity with:**  

* At least 3 years of working experience in Azure.
* Familiarity and proficiency in Azure IaaS and PaaS services.
* Strong Azure related Terraform skills, experience of Terragrunt is a plus.
* Experience of working with and develop enterprise grade landing zones in terraform (CAF-based or similar WAF aligned)
* DevOps for IaC experience should be familiar with defining and building automation of IaC
* Migration of existing code into a new desired architecture / turning non IaC deployments into IaC
* Bank experience
  

We value openness, transparency, willingness to share knowledge and constantly improve and We work according to agile principles.

 **Language Skills:**  

Swedish and English

title: Senior Nätverksspecialist
description:
Vi har nu ett behov hos en kund efter en Nätverksspecialist och söker därför en kollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd som konsult och arbetar hos kund alt. interna åtaganden gentemot våra kunder.  

  

**Vår ambitioner**  

Vår målsättning är att vara det ledande IT-konsultföretaget med de mest nöjda medarbetarna och kunderna. Hos oss arbetar du inte för cheferna – ledarskapet är här för att stötta dig. Vi sätter dig i centrum och strävar efter att du ska utvecklas och växa. Vi erbjuder en inspirerande arbetsmiljö med god stämning, intressanta projekt hos intressanta kunder och en stark kultur av kunskapsdelning. Vi har tilltro till våra medarbetares innovationskraft och ger dig och dina kollegor möjlighet att både utvidga och fördjupa era kunskaper.  

  

**Jobbeskrivning**  

Utveckla arbetssätt och rutiner för att distribuera säkerhetspatchar samt applikationer till Windowsservers i samtliga miljöer med hjälp av SCCM  

Erfarenhet av att ta fram arbetssätt för ständiga förbättringar inom SCCM samt införa dessa i andra team  

Drift och installation av virtuella servrar inkl. kringliggande infrastruktur, t. ex. nätverk, virtuell miljö samt hårdvaruresurser  

Agera på larm och incidenter på Windowsserverplattformen  

Drift och installation av applikationer upp till funktion inkl. MS SQL-konfiguration  

Arbete med certifikat, t. ex. skapa, förnya och felhantera  

Arbete med federering med hjälp av ADFS, uppsättning och felsökning  

Driva arbete med automation och effektivisering med hjälp av Powershell  

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**  

* Minst 8 års arbetslivserfarenhet av att installera och migrera SCCM i stora IT-miljöer med krav på hög säkerhet
* Goda kunskaper och minst 8 års arbetslivserfarenhet av Microsoft Windows Server 2016 och 2019 i större miljöer
* Goda kunskaper och minst 8 års arbetslivserfarenhet av Microsoft Active Directory, ADFS, DNS samt Windows brandväggshantering
* Minst 8 års erfarenhet av arbete i PowerShell
* Goda kunskaper i Azure DevOps (ADO)

  

**Meriterande**  

* Åtta års arbetslivserfarenhet av att ha implementerat SCCM på en stor myndighet (minst 10 000 klienter)
* Arbetslivserfarenhet av Azure-suiten
* Att ha genomfört minst tre automationer, som bidragit till effektivisering av arbetssättet
* Arbetslivserfarenhet av verktyg för att managera wmware-miljön

  

**Sista ansökningdatum:** 16-07-2024 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.


En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.


Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.


Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.


Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester?


Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.

  

Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.


Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?

 **Om Deploja**  

Vi sysselsätter idag seniora IT-specialister, inom bl.a. utveckling, test, testledning, projektledning, databas, Drift, Linux och ser oss alltid om efter fler kompetenta medarbetare.  

  

Transparens och flexibilitet är i alla fall viktigt för oss, med oss får man som konsult majoriteten av sin egen intäkt, i snitt har våra medarbetare höjt sin ersättning med 43% och har samtidigt ett av marknadens bästa förmånspaket. De som är med på vår resa idag har en trygg anställning MEN sätter sin egen lön och bestämmer själva över sina förmåner så som pension, utbildning, arbetstid och tjänstebil.


Våra kunder finns bland annat inom detaljhandel, bank/finans/försäkring, energi, transport och offentlig sektor. De flesta av våra kunder är i Stockholmsregionen men vi har även kunder i andra delar av landet.  

  

Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket och semestertider dröjer återkoppling längre än vanligt.

title: Founding Engineer - Full-stack with DevOps focus
description:
**About Normain**
-----------------


Founded in 2023, Normain is an AI platform for professional services. Our product lets niche consulting companies (think sustainability, purchasing, or company steering) create AI-versions of the services they offer, so they can scale their businesses beyond selling consulting hours.


We’re on a mission to fundamentally transform knowledge work away from repetitive, boring tasks that are often part of the work consultants do. Instead, we envision a world where AI lets humans be more human, and domain experts can spread their expertise and knowledge in ways that actually have a great impact for the better: by listening to- and building empathy with their clients—while AI takes care of the rest.


With new funds in our pockets, and some of Stockholm’s best tech advisors and business angels onboard as our extended team, we’re ready to kickstart Normain’s next chapter.

**About the Role**
------------------


We’re a diverse and passionate team of three co-founders looking for two Founding Engineers (this role and another one with ML/AI focus) that will join Normain at the earliest part of our journey. With this, you will get the opportunity to shape Normain’s technology at its core. This is a rare opportunity to join the ride of a lifetime, and be an integral part of it from the very beginning. No startup journey is ever easy, but we believe the opportunity of AI excites you, and that you don’t mind putting in the hard work if you get to do it with people you enjoy working with—on a mission you believe in.


In this role, you will work closely with the whole team, but especially with our technical Co-founder Kalle Hansson. Kalle has almost 20 years of experience from full-stack development, and spent most of his time before Normain as CTO & Co-founder at other tech startups. Together with Kalle and the other Founding Engineer, you will form our core Engineering team. You will all work broadly with implementing features required to deliver on Normain’s short-and long-term roadmap. However, when it comes to the DevOps aspects, you’re the one in charge.


It’s paramount that the platform we build is secure and performant. Hence, DevOps is a critical aspect of our product. The AI technology we’re building requires us to sometimes host our product ourselves, and sometimes in our clients’ VPC. We believe this challenge excites you, and that you can’t wait to lay the foundation for Normain’s rapid scaling journey ahead.

**What you’ll do**
------------------

### **Feature development**

* Drive Normain’s innovation by implementing cutting-edge features into our platform and its infrastructure
* Contribute to shaping Normain's technology foundation, focusing on scalability, security, and operational excellence to deliver on our ambitious product roadmap.

### **DevOps**

* Architect and maintain secure, high-performance DevOps infrastructure for Normain's AI platform, collaborating closely with the rest of the team
* Implement best practices in CI/CD, automation, and infrastructure as code to ensure efficient deployment and scalability across diverse environments, including client VPCs.
* Ensure cost-optimized self-hosting of AI models through efficient resource allocation, robust monitoring implementation, and system reliability enhancements to support Normain's rapid growth and scalability goals.

**Technical skills**
--------------------

### **We believe you have**

* Proficiency in TypeScript, with extensive experience in building robust and scalable web applications.
* Experience with React.
* Proficiency in building and maintaining APIs. Experience with Node.js or other server-side languages compatible with TypeScript.
* Strong experience from working with SQL databases.
* Strong experience with cloud platforms.
* Strong experience with containerization (Docker) and orchestration (Kubernetes).
* Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines and tools such as Jenkins, GitHub Actions, or GitLab CI.
* Experience with infrastructure as code (IaC) tools like Terraform or AWS CloudFormation.
* A strong understanding of security best practices in web development and database management.
* Experience working with auth mechanisms (e.g., OAuth, JWT, etc).

### **Extra points if you have**

* Experience with integrating GenAI APIs (e.g. OpenAI, Gemini and/or Mistral) and/or working with AI/ML models.
* An understanding of AI/ML concepts and experience in applying them to real-world problems
* Experience of hosting managed databases
* Experience using Azure's AI solutions
* Experience from self-hosting LLMs
* Experience in using tRPC

**Soft skills**
---------------

### **We believe you have**

* Experience from working in cross-functional teams where you collaborated with product managers, designers, and other stakeholders.
* A strong sense of ownership and accountability.
* Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.

### **Extra points if you have**

* Proven leadership experience in a senior engineering role.
* Ability to mentor and guide junior engineers and influence the technical direction of the company.
* Ability to articulate complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.

**Other qualifications**
------------------------

### **We believe you have**

* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to troubleshoot and resolve technical issues efficiently.
* A graduate degree in engineering or similar discipline from a tier one university.
* Experience from working at a technology startup.

### **Extra points if you have**

* Experience from navigating through a high growth phase of a startup company
* Experience from taking a product from zero to one, i.e. laying the very foundation of a product in a rapidly changing environment

**Culture**
-----------

### **We believe you will enjoy working at Normain if you:**

* Are passionate about the latest AI technology.
* Enjoy receiving and acting on feedback and improvement suggestions from your co-workers.
* Are curious about others’ perspectives, especially if they are different from your own.
* Enjoy the autonomy, responsibility, day-to-day changes, and short deadlines that working at an early-stage startup entails.
* Think the work you do and how it contributes to the mission is much more important than your title.
* Like having a good time with your colleagues at work.
* Believe that mental and physical well-being improves your ability to do your best work.
* Have a strong sense of integrity and inner compass about what’s wrong and what’s right.

title: Vass Kubernetes-wrangler för Platform Engineering och DevOps
description:
Är du en sån där som alltid ser möjligheter att göra saker en aning bättre, mer effektivt, säkert och tekniskt magiskt? Vi letar med ljus och led-lights efter vår nästa kollega till vårt Platform Engineering-team som verkligen leder vägen och jobbar med de senaste DevOps-teknikerna på marknaden.


Att jonglera Kubernetes i molnmiljö gör du i sömnen och du känner dig riktigt hemma i Azure. Mjukvaruutveckling ligger som bomull runt hjärtat hos dig och vi misstänker att du har ett genuint intresse av att jobba med både konfiguration och utveckling i Azure med allt från scripting till välkända verktyg. Gör du det, då kommer du att stortrivas, det lovar vi. Är Azure inte din hemmaplan utan du kanske känner dig mer bekväm i AWS? Det gör inget! Vi behöver dig där också - och det bästa är att vi kan hjälpa dig på traven att komma igång i Azure också, om du bara är tillräckligt erfaren i rollen på AWS. That's how we roll.


Du kommer att arbeta tillsammans med kollegor på våra kontor i både Malmö och Göteborg, såväl på distans som ett och annat trevligt möte "på riktigt". Är du engagerad och driven så kommer du att stortrivas - vi tror på att ge utrymme både för vidareutveckling och inflytande i sina uppdrag, eftersom det gör både våra konsulter och våra kunder nöjda och glada.


Vi har förstås lite krav på vad man ska kunna också, för att passa för rollen - så, checkar du av punkter här, så ska du definitivt inte vänta med att skicka in din ansökan.

**Vi förutsätter att du:**

* Har åtminstone fem (5) års tidigare erfarenhet av DevOps-arbete i Azure-miljö och/eller AWS.
* Har gedigen grym kunskap inom Kubernetes och Terraform
* Har erfarenhet av arbete med utveckling och felsökning i Azure Cloud
* Vet massor om att automatisera miljöer
* Har relevant utbildning, som en kandidat eller master inom datavetenskap eller liknande, eller motsvarande erfarenhet från arbetslivet.
* Är flytande i svenska och engelska, såväl i tal som skrift


Skulle du dessutom sedan tidigare ha varit en del av ett team som ansvarar för att utveckla och underhålla en teknisk plattform, gärna i Azure, då kittlar det lite extra hos oss.

title: Senior Data Fabric Engineer
description:
We are Sinch. Join us and be a part of a global leader in Communication Platforms as a Service (CPaaS) and mobile customer engagement. With presence in more than 60 countries, we enable businesses to reach everyone in the world, through mobile messaging, email, voice, and video.
  
We believe equal opportunities are the key to our success. No matter who you are, you'll be able to explore career options, face captivating challenges, and build skills alongside outstanding people.
  
The essence of the role
  
We are seeking a Senior Data Engineer to build, maintain, and support data infrastructure that powers our products worldwide. In this role, you will be a part of our Data Fabric team, responsible for overseeing our data infrastructure. Your blend of infrastructure expertise and data skills will ensure our operations run smoothly.
  
  

**As our Senior Data Fabric Engineer, you will:**  

As a member of our team, you will develop and maintain our data fabric, and craft robust monitoring solutions to ensure healthy and stable production systems. You'll also play a crucial role in continuously enhancing the fabric with new capabilities to meet evolving business needs. Your expertise in developing powerful, scalable, and maintainable data infrastructure solutions will be essential to the success of our data operations at Sinch.
  
Lead technically and in align with business counterparts.
  
Mentor colleagues and foster a culture of collaboration.
  
Define, plan, and implement solutions for arising needs.
  
Collaborate with other parts of the data organization and R&D to optimize and improve existing solutions.
  
Drive innovation with your expertise and proactive approach.
  
  

Who are you?
  
An experienced professional with 3-6 years of senior-level capacity in Data Engineer, Site Reliability Engineer (SRE), or Platform Engineer.
  
Skilled in communication and mentoring.
  
Knowledgeable in one of the big three cloud providers (GCP, AWS, Azure).
  
Proficient in Infrastructure as Code (IaC) and DevOps procedures.
  
A problem-solver with a strong analytical mindset.
  
Software background is a plus.
  
  

Ready to chase your dreams?
  
Submit your application in English and join us in making seamless and impactful connections worldwide. Be part of our dynamic data team that promotes growth and embraces hybrid work.
  
At Sinch, we value learning, adapt to change, and offer opportunities for personal and professional development. Unfortunately, we are currently unable to support relocation outside the EU at present, therefore, we welcome applicants who hold a Swedish or EU/EEA citizenship or have a valid work permit for Sweden.

title: Digital Product Manager - Energy Management Systems
description:
Transport is at the core of modern society. Imagine using your expertise to shape sustainable transport solutions for the future? If you seek to make a difference on a global scale, working with next-gen technologies and the sharpest collaborative teams, then we could be a perfect match.

*We shape the world we want to live in!*  

  

Volvo Energy is our newest business area with the overarching purpose of accelerating electrification and driving circularity for a better tomorrow. With an agile approach and a can-do mindset, we actively work to ensure the acceleration of the electrification transformation every day in all that we do. As the Volvo Group, we are driving circularity in our industry forward in these important areas.

  

We are now looking for a new colleague to join our team at Volvo Energy as **Digital Product Manager – Energy Management Systems.**

**Volvo Energy Digital & IT**
-----------------------------

Digital & IT is a function within Volvo Energy. We support our customers transition to a carbon-free world through great Digital solutions and experiences that enables customers to shift to fossil-free transport operations. We truly care about the customer’s business in terms of up-time, safety and productivity.

  

  

**What are we looking for in this specific role?**  

Volvo Energy is building a highly qualified digital platform, an Energy Management System (EMS), to support the large need for Battery Energy Storage Systems (BESS). We are growing our team and are looking for a Digital Product Manager for the EMS and battery optimization/monitoring (BOM) area.

  

You will be managing a set of digital products and be a natural go-to expert for your own digital capabilities within the EMS area.


You will identify needs and define roadmaps and backlogs for digital capabilities within your responsibility.


You will define the digital solutions best suited for these needs and define when it makes sense build own, and when to partner with other digital players in the EMS/BOM area.


Time to market is of great essence, why we strive to build and learn in short development and release cycles as well as leveraging different partnerships to provide EMS capabilities.

**Making it a success for yourself and Volvo Energy**
-----------------------------------------------------


Welcome to a global team unified by an important mission, great ideas, fun, diversity, and inclusion. Our colleagues are - and will always be - the most important part of the story, as each colleague truly matters and plays an essential role in our journey.

  

To succeed, we believe you are innovative, pragmatic, creative with a positive spirit, curious and have an entrepreneurial mindset. Being recognized in your specialties, you are a forward-looking person, and you see opportunities when others see risks. Being appreciated by your peers, you enjoy connecting with a broad network, building win-win approaches and developing relationships.

  

You have a strong ability to move from words to action in an organized and structured way. You are down-to-earth and are equally at home working hands-on as you are leading strategic discussions.

  

Consequently, whilst demands are high, there is also plenty of opportunities to learn and grow - as a professional and as a person. We will be a fairly small team and therefore look for colleagues that thoroughly enjoy this intrapreneurial challenge, can hit the ground running and lead with passion, perform with purpose and transform with vision. Moreover, it will be essential you have a strong ability to form trustful relationships to effectively work with partners - inside and outside of the Volvo Group – in a cross-functional manner.

  

If our entrepreneurial spirit, adaptability, and customer-focused mindset light your inner fire, we might be a great match!  

  

**Qualifications likely required to be successful:**  

o Experience from working with energy management systems in the energy sector is considered an advantage.  

o Good understanding of:  

o EMS and SCADA  

o IIot gateways  

o Modbus and OPC-UA  

o OpenADR, IEC 60870-5, 61850 and DNP-3  

o NIS/NIS2  

o Understanding of charging solutions, eMSP/CPMS, and associated standards OCPI/OCPP  

o Solid understanding of cyber security, data management and modern integration technologies.  

o Experience from Agile development and DevOps practices  

o Strong technology interest - always interested in learning more  

o A “boots on the ground, get the job done” attitude  

o University degree relevant to the position: in electrical engineering, industrial engineering, computer science, Informatics or equivalent.  

o Fluent in English, written and spoken.

 *This position is placed in CampX, Gothenburg, Sweden.*

**Ready for the next move?**
----------------------------


Are you excited to bring your skills and disruptive ideas to the table? We can’t wait to hear from you. Apply today!

  

In addition to your CV, please provide a cover letter describing yourself and remember to answer with your reflections on the two following questions in your cover letter:  

  

* What are the main barriers impacting the adoption of electromobility within the commercial transport sector?
* What are the obstacles from a truck driver perspective when shifting towards Battery electric vehicles and how could Digital solutions help overcome these?
  

Last application date: 2024-08-19

  

Feel free to contact us if you have further questions:  

Claus Biller, Head of Enterprise Architecture  

e-mail: claus.biller@volvo.com  

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/claus-biller-90046531/

  

We value your data privacy and therefore do not accept applications via mail.

 **Who we are and what we believe in**  

Our focus on Inclusion, Diversity, and Equity allows each of us the opportunity to bring our full authentic self to work and thrive by providing a safe and supportive environment, free of harassment and discrimination. We are committed to removing the barriers to entry, which is why we ask that even if you feel you may not meet every qualification on the job description, please apply and let us decide.

  

Applying to this job offers you the opportunity to join **Volvo Group**. Every day, across the globe, our trucks, buses, engines, construction equipment, financial services, and solutions make modern life possible. We are almost 100,000 people empowered to shape the future landscape of efficient, safe and sustainable transport solutions. Fulfilling our mission creates countless career opportunities for talents with sharp minds and passion across the group’s leading brands and entities.

 **Volvo Energy** lives and leads the change in accelerating Volvo Group’s electrification journey and driving circularity for a better tomorrow. We bring together people with who will work in a highly diverse, equal and inclusive global context with an entrepreneurial spirit where everyone is key and directly contributes to achieving our ambitions for wanted position: better for people – better for planet – better for business. Together – from individual success to collective significance!
company_description: Every day, we work with some of the sharpest and most creative brains in our field to leave our society in better shape for the next generation.

title: Senior Site Reliability Engineer
description:
Is “to improve things” your middle name, and do you want to be part of an exciting journey? We are now recruiting a new team member to IT Operations! To reach our vision at ATG IT and deliver world class business innovations, we in the operations department have started the journey of adopting to ATG IT’s product centric approach. By this we will increase our efforts and skills in automation, in cloud usage, and of course service delivery. A central part of this effort is our Site Reliability Engineer (SRE) team.
  
  

**In this role you will:**  

* Maintain System Availability: Ensure our systems are up and running, minimizing downtime
* Accelerate Feature Deployment: Reduce time to market for new features, enhancing system performance
* Monitor and Troubleshoot: Use and develop tools for monitoring, troubleshooting, and quality assurance
* Incident Management: Rapidly resolve incidents, conduct root cause analysis, and implement preventive measures
* Tool Development and Automation: Create and automate tools, and share knowledge with IT colleagues at ATG


Is this you?
  
We are looking for a senior site reliability engineer colleague who is very skilled when it comes to analysing complex issues in a micro service architecture and has good coding/scripting experience! Besides this we trust that you have an eye for details, are proactive and triggered by problem solving. Good communication and cooperation skills are essential in this role, as we will have close dialogue with many different colleagues from different sections at ATG, such as Development and Architecture. A DevOps mindset and a great interest for technologies within your area and generally in IT is a big advantage. On-calls will be a part of your duty and will rotate in the team.
  
  

**We also see that you have:**  

* A good general understanding of distributed systems and micro service architecture
* Solid technical background in IT system development/system administration
* Software engineering background and/or experience in tool development, e.g., Python, Go lang, JavaScript, Java or Kotlin
* Experience working with Application Performance Monitoring tools, e.g., Dynatrace or other monitoring/metrics tools e.g., Prometheus and Grafana
* Experience working with centralized logging platforms, e.g., Splunk
* Experience working with container orchestration, e.g., OpenShift or Kubernetes
* Experience working with Public Cloud, e.g., AWS


"I started at ATG in 2019 with the assignment to start up the SRE function"
  
I really enjoy working with this team of bright people where we come together to analyze and solve problems or potential issues. We work in an agile way where everyone contributes and takes responsibility for their parts. I have a background as a developer and really enjoy deep diving into technical issues. I have also worked extensively as a manager of development teams and like to coach teams to bring out their full potential.
  
* Recruting manager, Erik Änggård, Manager IT SRE


We are the game
  
For almost 50 years, ATG has been delivering excitement and entertainment to the people of Sweden. Our motivation is to safeguard the Swedish equine industry, and to continue being a responsible gambling company at the cutting edge. Our vision to deliver the world's best gambling experience. With us, you're part of an innovative environment – using the latest technology to develop world-class gambling experiences. Self-leadership and competence development are important to us. Since the beginning, in 1974, we have built and managed the systems for our products, which handle 4,500,000 transactions per day.
  
  

Join the game!
  
You are welcome to submit your application either via our recruitment portal or using your LinkedIn profile – whichever is easiest and most convenient for you. Feel free to read more about us on our careers page, and don't hesitate to get in touch if you have any questions about the position.
  
  

We apply a 6 month probationary period, and perform background checks for all roles. The position is full-time, and based at our office at Solvalla, right next to the racecourse. We work flexibly, which means that you’ll have the opportunity to combine remote working with working from the office, depending on the role. Join us in building the world's best gambling experience!
  
  

Selection of the applications will begin in August. Have a great summer!
  
  

Så här har vi det
  
Hos oss är du del av en innovativ miljö och med hjälp av den senaste tekniken utvecklar du den bästa spelupplevelsen. Vi gillar att samarbeta och hos oss får du stort utrymme att påverka ditt arbetssätt. Här hittar du nyfikna, nytänkande medarbetare och ledare – viktiga egenskaper för att kunna utveckla och utvecklas. Liksom energi , mod och motivation. ​
  
  

För att må bra är skrattmuskeln lika viktig att träna som alla andra muskler. Både den fysiska och den mentala hälsan skapar balans i livet. Hur vi har det på jobbet påverkar privatlivet- och vice versa. Vi ser det som en självklarhet att ge det stöd och de verktyg som behövs. ​ Ditt val av arbetsplats och arbetssätt är flexibelt och vi lägger stor vikt på självledarskap.​
  
  

Vi bryr oss om varandra och respekterar varandras olikheter på ATG. Och vi vill att våra kunder ska må bra och ha roligt när de spelar. Vi bryr oss också om sportens välmående, dvs. idrottarna och hästarna - och samhället runt omkring oss. Vi drivs inte av privata vinstintressen utan allt överskott går tillbaka till våra ägare, svensk trav- och galoppsport, något som både känns och gör gott.

title: Senior Azure Cloud Engineer
description:
Vi har nu ett behov hos en kund efter en Azure Cloud Engineer och söker därför en kollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd som konsult och arbetar hos kund alt. interna åtaganden gentemot våra kunder.
   

  

**Vår ambitioner**
 Vår målsättning är att vara det ledande IT-konsultföretaget med de mest nöjda medarbetarna och kunderna. Hos oss arbetar du inte för cheferna – ledarskapet är här för att stötta dig. Vi sätter dig i centrum och strävar efter att du ska utvecklas och växa. Vi erbjuder en inspirerande arbetsmiljö med god stämning, intressanta projekt hos intressanta kunder och en stark kultur av kunskapsdelning. Vi har tilltro till våra medarbetares innovationskraft och ger dig och dina kollegor möjlighet att både utvidga och fördjupa era kunskaper.
   

  

**Roll:**
 Som Cloud Engineer inom vår Cloud Tribe kommer du att ingå i ett team av 20 mycket engagerade kollegor som använder ny teknik för att utveckla lösningar och värdefulla tjänster. Vårt leveransområde inkluderar riktlinjer, bästa praxis och stödjande funktionaliteter, som alla banar väg för våra utvecklare att skapa en modern bank i molnet.
   

  

 Som Cloud Engineer kommer du att:
   

  

* Utveckla och underhålla tjänster ovanpå offentliga molnplattformar som tillgodoser plattformens tekniska styrning och efterlevnad.
* Arbeta med drift, utveckling, underhåll och säkerhet för plattformen.


**Grundläggande krav:**
* Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet inom Azure.
* Färdighet och kunnighet inom Azure IaaS och PaaS-tjänster.
* Stark kunskap om Terraform relaterat till Azure, erfarenhet av Terragrunt är ett plus.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med och utveckla företagsklassade landningszoner i Terraform (CAF-baserade eller liknande WAF-anpassade).
* DevOps för IaC-erfarenhet, bör vara bekant med att definiera och bygga automation av IaC.
* Migrering av befintlig kod till en ny önskad arkitektur / omvandla icke-IaC-distributioner till IaC.
* Erfarenhet från banksektorn.


**Sista ansökningsdag:** 
 19-07-2024
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

**Om Deploja**
 Vi sysselsätter idag seniora IT-specialister, inom bl.a. utveckling, test, testledning, projektledning, databas, Drift, Linux och ser oss alltid om efter fler kompetenta medarbetare.
   

  

 Transparens och flexibilitet är i alla fall viktigt för oss, med oss får man som konsult majoriteten av sin egen intäkt, i snitt har våra medarbetare höjt sin ersättning med 43% och har samtidigt ett av marknadens bästa förmånspaket. De som är med på vår resa idag har en trygg anställning MEN sätter sin egen lön och bestämmer själva över sina förmåner så som pension, utbildning, arbetstid och tjänstebil.
   

  

 Våra kunder finns bland annat inom detaljhandel, bank/finans/försäkring, energi, transport och offentlig sektor. De flesta av våra kunder är i Stockholmsregionen men vi har även kunder i andra delar av landet.
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket och semestertider dröjer återkoppling längre än vanligt.

title: AZURE Cloud Engineer | 2024MGSB0701 x 259112
description:
**Job Summary**
 As a Cloud Engineer within our Cloud Tribe, you will join a team of 20 highly engaged peers using new technologies to develop solutions and valuable services. The delivery includes guardrails, best practices, and supporting functionalities, all of which are paving the way for developers to create a modern bank in the Cloud.
   

  

 As a Cloud Engineer, you will:
   

  

* Develop and maintain services on top of Public Cloud Platforms catering for the platform’s technical Governance & Compliance.
* Work with operations, development, maintenance, and security of the platform.


**Skills/Experience Needed**
 As a person, you are eager to always learn more and enjoy sharing and increasing your knowledge while working with others. You are highly engaged and interested in everything that happens in the CNCF space. You are motivated by responsibility and unafraid of tackling complex problems and finding the best possible solutions.
   

  

 You have experience in both development and operations as well as familiarity with:
   

  

* At least 3 years of working experience in Azure.
* Familiarity and proficiency in Azure IaaS and PaaS services.
* Strong Azure related Terraform skills, experience of Terragrunt is a plus.
* Experience of working with and develop enterprise grade landing zones in terraform (CAF-based or similar WAF aligned)
